places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Mandal Ghang
address: Upper, near PWD Circuit House, Bhalukpong, 790114

reviews.text:
This place had amazing views and lovely people who made our stay even more exciting.

We had bonfire in the evening and spent some time with the people there chit chatting with good music and ambience.

The view from our room was awesome and we could see the sunrise.
The kameng river can also be seen from here.

They had lots and lots of plants and beautiful flowers. Perfect place for a nature lover.

They have their own restaurant where you can order food and the food tastes really good.

I loved my stay there and would definitely visit again if I go to Bhalukpong.

The best thing about this hotel is that you will get to experience one of the best sunrises. The hotel is located just next to the river and you will get the best view from the terrace. You can also see the clear sky with n number of stars.
The rooms were pretty good, clean and well-maintained. The staff was courteous and helpful, and the food served was good.
So overall it was a comforting stay for me.
We had a comfortable stay here. They accommodated our last minute request of having an extra guest. The rooms, washroom are nice & decent. Food prepared was homely. The views, sunrise are beautiful.

Great hotel, very clean, very well situated next to the Tiger reserve, but the best of all was definitely the service. Big thanks to Jessica who managed everything perfectly and was always ver helpful and on point on everything. Food, activities, transport, she organised everything on time in the best way.

The location of the hotel is great with a very good sunrise view. The food was okaish, but rooms were very good.
Good budget hotel to be considered for your halt in Bhalukponk

places_with_reviews.name: Waii International Hotel Bhalukpong
address: Lower Bhalukpong, near IOCL Petrol Pump, Bhalukpong, 790114

reviews.text: Located just near the Arunachal Pradesh checking point in Bhalukpong, the location is perfectly accessible. There's a market place just outside the hotel, and is also near a petrol pump. The hotel building has great amenities like a salon, a gym, and a restaurant. The rooms are spacious, well furnished, and is lit (except for few ceiling lights which were broken). Overall a great hotel to book your stay in for any purpose! 👍🏻

The hotel is only worth the location as a way-stop. The food was tasteless. The staff are very cooperative but the hotel fails. The rooms are not worth the rate.

The door locks don't work, poor maintenance, no power, no soft drink, no cold water, food quality is poor. After 8 nobody will answer reception.

Not preferable.
Rooms don't give a feeling of cleanliness.
Assam tourism guest house is nearby should be considered instead of this place

Conveniently located near the border of Arunachal Pradesh and Assam, the hotel has spacious rooms and all the necessary privileges.
There are markets and eateries near this hotel
Courteous staff, good food (complementary breakfast was very good)
On our request they gave us an all-out also since the room had some mosquitoes.
Overall very good stay experience for one night.
Beautiful and cozy stay, food was great, over all hotel is nice and clean. The property location is good. The staff has been very polite and welcoming.  Tq Soo much All Of Staff & Managers Sir ☺️👍

Hotel seagull is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed..
The rooms are very big and airy.
Washrooms are clean and have all sanitary facilities.
We enjoyed s great view from balcony.
Their service was mind blowing.

This  hotel cum homestay offered the perfect blend of homely warmth and hotel-style comforts. Our stay here was an exquisite experience that combined the best of both worlds. It is siruated in the Upper Bhalukpong area.
It is good for a stay if you have come from a long distance (afar) and want to rest for the day to travel for the next day to a new destination.
Our room was spacious, elegantly furnished, and meticulously clean. The attention to detail in design and the comfort of the bed made every night's rest truly rejuvenating.
The staff's hospitality was exceptional. From the moment we stepped in, their warm welcome and attentiveness made us feel like honored guests. They ensured every request was promptly met.The hotel's dining options were decent. Breakfast was simple but tasted good. The menu had quite a few options that catered to various tastes. The breakfast spread was extensive and delicious.

The seamless blend of homely comforts and hotel-like amenities created an unforgettable experience. It is a kid friendly stay. In all it was clean, well maintained and provided  a comfortable stay to relax after a tiring journey before starting a fresh for the    next day  .   Considering the price point, the hotel offered good value for money.  Highly recommended.

Lovely stay. The location is great with a nice view. The hotel itself was also beautifully decorated with plants and flowers. Rooms were spacious and clean and all rooms had hot water. Staff was also very friendly and readily helped us with everything.

Overall, I highly recommend it for families and large groups.
This is a pretty good one. Spacious rooms with absolutely amazing food.

Very spacious rooms. Hotel full of various flower & orchid. 24 hours hot water served. Hygienic rooms & bathroom. Service is little bit slow but manageable. Kameng river is within walking distance.  Stayed for one days on Oct'22. Recommended for family trip.

I will give negative review to this hotel.
I stayed there one night on 26th Oct 2023. At night while we were sleeping, thief entered our room through the window and took away my mobile and also money from my wallet. I think it is the responsibility of the owner to provide security to the tourists. In the morning they said, " you should have locked the window". Actually the window was closed but not locked and the window was covered by curtain so we didn't checked the lock.  I think if such thefts are common in this area then they should warn the tourist.

Apart from the location, this hotel is probably one of the worst things that happened during the Arunachal Pradesh trip.

1.	The hotel staff, including the manager(probably owner), seemed shady. First, they must learn the difference between running a shop and operating in the hospitality industry. We came from a different place, and there were many other hotels in that area, but there was not a pinch of hospitality in their gesture. I remember the owner or manager (I don’t know who the lady was), asked me twice about the advanced payment as if I was going to run away without paying.
2.	When my wife asked for an extra blanket, she plainly said every room had a fixed amount of blankets and not possible to provide. It may be possible, not a problem in that, but the way she threw the sentence was as if we came to a dharmasala.
3.	The ambience was straight out from Norman Bate’s hotel (Hitchcock’s Psycho). Nobody was there; two staff looked at us as if we were the first guests they ever saw. The sceptical looks indifferent attitude show the room, and when asking about the food, the uninteresting reply to tell us to go to the nearby shops to search for food.
4.	A few days ago, before our arrival, a theft happened in the hotel, and the owner completely denied the responsibility. She even told us to lock all doors and windows. When we entered the room, the balcony door’s latches were broken.

Overall, in my opinion if anyone wants to stay in Bhalukpong, it is better to stay in Tippi or any hotel near the city. The location is good but the food joints are very rudimentary, people are cynical, and there is a strange air, which is a bit disturbing.

Excellent property and very convenient with very peaceful environment. The hotel with an enchanting view ,scenery was beautiful to watch from the room itself and it was a relieve to walk in such a quiet and peaceful environment. The staffs were very helpful and always available , even in midnights.
Heartiest thank you sam bro n your staff, your hospitality, services are too good it's beyond our imagination, price is too reasonable,... Keep it up bro, hoping to make a next visit next year...
Very nice hotel ,&very good service

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel wanga tsang residency
address: Chariduar - Tawang Road, Balipara - Bhalukpung Rd, Bhalukpong, 790114

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night while going towards Tawang from Guwahati. Room is decent, budget-friendly. It is situated in the main market area, so you'll get lot of food options outside. Regarding room service one thing I would like to mention, they didn't provide drinking water, we had to buy from outside. Overall good option for one night stay within budget.
Very Good Service provided. Value for money rooms. Hot water 24×7. Warm Rooms. Clean Beds. Beautiful Mountain View.

When we were heading towards Tawang we decided to stay here for a night.Very clean and tidy. AC and non AC both are available.The place from where you will get the Pass to go to Tawang is very close to this hotel.This is situated absolutely at the border area of Arunachal and Assam.Quality foods are available.I would love to prefer the momos.
A cheap and clean hotel alone the main market area with ample of restaurant options nearby
Guests happy. Neat & Clean Rooms. Location Good.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Druk
address: 2J8P+PC3, near EAC office, Upper Bhalukpong, Bhalukpong, 790114

reviews.text: Nothing extraordinary about the place but no complaints as well. Spacious and clean rooms with all basic facilities. An all girls staff that was friendly enough. Good food and fairly priced. Just 2 minutes drive from the main road.

A convenient hotel in AP located right on the entrance/ exit to Greater Arunachal, very close to Assam border. Convenient for travellers coming down from Bomdilla for evening stay, or those reaching it from Guwahati airport in the morning before commencing the climb to the mighty Himalayas early next morning. Rooms are spacious and comfortable, food is very tasty and staff is courteous. One can enjoy a drive to the Maneri national park and Tipi Orchid Research Center nearby by taking an extra days stay

Moderately rated hotel. Although doesn't give an impressive look from outside,  the hotel inside is quite impressive. Rooms are well furnished and spacious. Dining com reception hall is a huge one. Food is also not bad. Both veg. as well as non veg. items are available.
Perfect place for stay when you plan tawang or dirang road trip its very pleasant place good for family or solo travelers too
Excellent service and cooperative staff. Food is wonderful. The rooms are clean and well kept. Moreover, it is in a quaint place. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Gori Chen
address: Bhalukpong Lower Bhalukpong, near IOCL Petrol Pump, Bhalukpong, 790114

reviews.text: Too tight and congested rooms. Poor service and costly rooms. Even oyos in Guwahati is far better then this hotel
Good enough as a budget stay at Bhalukpong.
Very satisfied..the hotel is neat and clean..keep up Gorichen team,👍
Value for money
Very costly

places_with_reviews.name: Chotten Hotel, fooding and lodging
address: opposite to Maruti Suzuki dealership, Tippi Village, 790114

reviews.text: This place is in Tippi which is around 5-6 km away from the Assam-Arunachal border area "Bhalukpong". The Hotel has a very good parking space and the place is located near the river front . The food is very homely and yum. The owner here is a lady who is very friendly and helpful. They have lodging and gift corner as well. Overall a very nice place to stay overnight and enjoy the the orchid, scenic view, waterfall of Tippi.

Ample parking area. A place to relax and prepare for perilous journey towards Bomdila - Tawang. Nearby places to visit during the stay - Science museum, Orchidarium, waterfall, Kameng river.
Food is yum. Air conditioners in the fooding area helps a lot. Staff - always helpful.
Very nice food in sarvesh for room
Good to stay here
Phone number?

We reached Bhalukpong on 19th May 2016 late evening, our driver, BabuAli suggested this riverside hotel. Really a superb view of the river and the road to Tawang just below, you could see all the vehicles zooming to Tawang. We got Egg curry cooked and served mostly by young girls. A darkish young girl, (around 22yrs) the manager, showed us the rooms and we at once fell in love with the ambience, started staying, though perhaps not so luxurious in appearance and cleanliness, but we loved the moon-lit view of the river rather too much and the decency of the manager, a little snobbish, yet tolerable. Interestingly, this hotel has all the energizing switches of AC, geyser etc. at the reception counter too and I was told different rates would apply if we used AC, we laughed at this very inexpensive hotel's extra-charges !!! Next morning there was a ceremony for all Tibetans living in and around Arunachal, there was a huge queue, (300 kids) around 6:30 AM, the festivities started right from this hotel with the burning of Fern Tree Leaves and an agile Ghost dancing like a snake-dragon !!! I took long videos for an hour right from my balcony, then the queue move away. We were refused BF as there was no cook at the time, all had gone participating in the rituals, yet we pardoned them as we were still awed with the ceremony. Started for Dirang...alas ! forgot my expensive pant and belt and a few other items etc. at Solu hotel room !!
On our return journey from Tawang, a few days later, we just took a chance if the pant and items were still there ! OMG, everything was kept  we had never expected to be,  a fair looking chef girl (around 25yrs) brought the items immediately and returned to me ! I really wanted to give her a hefty sum as tips since she literally shocked me with their honesty, but was unfortunately distracted by some incoming tourists asking me questions about the dangers of touring Tawang etc. while explaining I move out of the hotel and forgot about the tips I owed her ! So sorry ! got onto our vehicle when I realized my mistake I was far away in Assam returning to Mumbai..but even to this day I remember the girl's (Solu's)  honesty !!! If there were pics of the hotel staff  I could send her the money I still feel indebted !

It's a great budget option to stay at bhalukpong, next to river. It has a great view and calm environment to offer . Location shown on map is not right. It's actually at Tippi, 5 km ahead of bhalukpong, next to Essar fuel pump. Service is good, rooms are decent. If you are staying der don't miss to visit d river in d backyard of d hotel.
Specialty in Chinese cuisine also... It's a wonderful cosy place for newly couple's .....
The name of the hotel has been changed to hotel Mandal Ghang. The best place to stay in Bhalukpong....
Very good service .good view

IITG students bound for Tawang
Good place good food
Veg thali and fried rice were good
Don't go for any cafe here

Stayed here in April 2023. Very ordinary. Good location. No mirror and wardrobe. Unhygenic Bathroom with broken door and broken window pane. Will not suggest for family stay. Backpackers and low budget travellers may opt for. Restaurant is good. Food price on the higher side like in all part of AP. Owner lady is nice and cooperative.
Food is very nice. Try ethnic food like boiled chicken or boiled pork etc
Very unhygienic and unsatisfied service, with very poor quality food with such high rate. Really unsatisfied with this hotel
Would Rate This Place 5 Of 5 This Place Serves Amazing Food
